author: Emily
text:
TODAY’S PRIZES: SIGNED copy of Denial, Demand and Surrender! 
TO WIN (do any or all of the following!): READ chapter one and tell me what your favorite quote is ➜ http://lisareneejones.com/books/provocative/#excerpt COMMENT, LIKE, SHARE this post ➜ http://bit.ly/2nPwCRV ENTER TO WIN a full set of Inside Out and Careless Whispers books signed here ➜ http://www.subscribepage.com/LRJgiveaway COMMENT on this post SHARE this blog post BONUS : Tweet/Facebook Post the following message ➜ He wants her. He has to have her. But that won’t change why he came for her…Provocative by @LisaReneeJones ($2.99) http://lisareneejones.com/duet MORE ENTRIES AND MORE PRIZES TO BE WON!! – Click on each of the following days to be entered in that days giveaway as well! Each day as NEW entries and NEW prizes!! Day 1 | Day 2 | Day 3 | Day 4 | Day 5 | Day 6 | Day 7 | Day 8 | Day 9 | Day 10 | Day 11 | Day 12 | Day 13 | Day 14 
LEAVE YOUR LINKS IN THE COMMENTS BELOW! Review links, social media post links, Goodreads profile links ( must be public!) etc. WINNER IS CHOSEN FROM THOSE WHO LEAVE COMMENTS WITH THEIR LINKS! 
CHANCE PRIZE: For every 200 shelves that PROVOCATIVE is added to on Goodreads I’m going to draw a winner for a $25 Amazon gift card!! We’ve already had one winner, so be sure to get your friends to add it so I can draw for another winner! ★★ABOUT THE BOOK★★ 
Book one in the sexy and intense new White Lies duet from New York Times Bestselling Author Lisa Renee Jones! 
There are those moments in life that are provocative in their very existences, that embed in our minds forever, and sometimes our very souls. They change us, mold us, maybe even save us. But some are darker, dangerous. If we allow them to, they control us. Seduce us. Quite possibly even destroy us. 
The moment I walked into Sonoma’s Reid Winter Winery and Vineyard and made eye contact with Faith Winter for the first time was one of those moments. Provocative because I know at least one of her secrets, of which, I suspect she has many. Provocative because she believes I was a stranger to her when we met, but I am not. Provocative because I sought her out, with no intention of touching her. But now I have. Now I want her. Now I have to have her. But that changes nothing. It doesn’t change why I came for her. 
PRE-ORDER PROVOCATIVE NOW!
title: 3 DAYS UNTIL PROVOCATIVE!! Giveaway Time!
